markdown.markdown:
I am a first-generation college student passionate about research in biological data science. My research at the POP-GEM Lab focuses on examining cross-ancestry phenotypic and genetic associations with major depression and determining if interpersonal violence exposure is correlated with depression symptoms and if these associations vary by sex. This fall, I will be attending University of Maryland Baltimore's Epidemiology and Human Genetics doctoral program to progress toward my goal of becoming an academic researcher and professor. Virginia Commonwealth University \| Richmond, VA
***M.S. in Bioinformatics*** \| Jan 2021 - Expected Aug 2023 Virginia Commonwealth University \| Richmond, VA
***B.S. in Bioinformatics*** \| Jul 2018 - May 2022 Virginia Commonwealth University \| Richmond, VA
